document.title: Digital World Real Estate Registration
document.author: ASPPIBRA-DAO
document.description: This document prepared by the ASPPIBRA-DAO team seeks to bring a solution to cases of Urban and Rural Land Regularization throughout the country, aiming at the digital inclusion of all owners and possessors of properties in Brazil. In compliance with LAW No. 13,465, OF JULY 11, 2017. Which provides for urban and rural land regularization, we apply the use of blockchain technology to scale real estate registration worldwide, solving the problems of informality and transparency in the registration of properties, guaranteeing access to inviolable decentralized information. A unique NFT representing ownership of your house.

sales_value.list_price: Specify the list price of the property
sales_value.appraised_value: Specify the appraised value of the property
sales_value.negotiated_sales_price: Specify the negotiated sales price, if different from the list price
sales_value.date_of_sale: Specify the date when the property was sold
sales_value.buyer_information: Include the name and contact details of the buyer, if available
sales_value.payment_method: Specify the method of payment used for the sale, e.g., cash, mortgage, etc.
sales_value.terms_of_sale: Specify any special terms or conditions of the sale, if applicable
